name: Children of Scáth
description:
„Small child in search. Seek Inis Fáil, lsle of destiny. Seek, and thy may find what you seek.”

Children of Scáth is the working name for an upcoming metroidvania action-adventure that is inspired by Irish/Celtic mythology. 

The lost story

Take control of Scáthach, who is looking for her lost twin sister. To achieve her goal, she travels to Inis Faíl, a mysterious ancient Isle where the sun sets, in hope to find her sister Aífe. 

Feature

  • Explore the mythical yet dangerous land that will test your resourcefulness and determination.
  • Use your trusty spear and shadow magic to overcome those lands and their inhabitants.
  • Face mighty creatures.
  • Discover hidden secrets, treasures and NPC`s on your way.
  • And enjoy the story not only of the npc but the story of Scáthach and Aífe.
